## linspace() function

Builds a vector of `binCount` evenly spaces numbers between `xMin` (inclusive) and `xMax` (exclusive). Throws an error if xMin is greater than or equal to xMax.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function linspace(xMin: number, xMax: number, binCount: number): NumberVector;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  xMin | <code>number</code> | The smallest value in the vector |
|  xMax | <code>number</code> | The largest value in the vector |
|  binCount | <code>number</code> | The number of entries |

<b>Returns:</b>

`NumberVector`

The evenly-spaced vector

## Example


```
linspace(0, 1, 5); // [ 0, 0.2, 0.4, 0.6, 0.8 ]

```
